title: My pixel4 was broken just after Android update. The phone is repeating reboot.
content: My pixel4 was broken just after Android update. The phone is repeating reboot. I reset the phone but I'm still seeing the same problem. I bought the phone in the US last year but now I live in Japan. I would like to know how to contact Google support. I tried to do everything which is described in Get help with your Pixel phone but I canâ€™t get it because I'm outside the US.
